Hat's Brain Dump

Jekyll Novice

Sunday, January 10-2016

They say the third time is the charm and since this is now the third time I am resurrecting my personal blog I am hoping this is also the last time I do so from scratch (No, I don’t mean I used MIT’s Scratch language). What a learning experience it was to start with Jekyll having only dabbed into web development since the majority of my time is spent in the software world. It is quite frustrating to write a css file or html file to have it just up and disappear once you run the server. If only I had read the manual before trying to just jump straight into the coding (Sigh). Anyway, after doing so and figuring out how the markdown language and sass works it was eye opening! The overall look of the site will definitely be improved over time but since I am going to go ahead and do all the coding myself without the help of templates that will take some time. Going to go back to Python and Unity for now so stay tuned.

My personal blog where any given day I will attempt to convert the thoughts flowing through my mind into text. It has been four years since I have blogged so enjoy the old material, which I also now laugh at, and feel free to critique anything that I write.
